japanese: このお魚の煮付け、美味しいですね。
translation: This soy sauce-simmered fish really is delicious.

japanese:
ちょうどいい具合に味がしみてるし、
煮崩れもしてないし、なかなかの出来だわ。
translation:
It tastes just right,
and the fish hasn't fallen apart from boiling it.
This is really good.

japanese: 私も、毎回こんな風に煮付けができたらなー。
translation:
If only I could make a soy sauce-simmered meal
like this every day.

japanese:
らいはの煮付けは充分に美味いぞ！
自信を持っていい！
translation:
Your sauce-simmered meals are delicious, Raiha!
Have some confidence!

japanese: お兄ちゃんの『美味い』はあんまり信用できないから。
translation:
That's because I can't really trust you
when YOU say 'delicious,' big bro.
